TopicTitle: Orbital Surveys not showing in Tracking Station

Articles.Content:
I've done orbital surveys of both Mun and Minmus, and can see the results from the ships with the survey scanner, but the tracking station won't show the data on the resource tab for those bodies and says I have to do an orbital survey first. What's up with that? 

Also with the narrow-band scanner, will that show the little GUI if used on another ship without the survey scanner or do both instruments have to be on the same ship for it to work?

1. I thought I remembered seeing this issue filed as a bug report, but I can't find it. Are you using any mods?

2. No, you only have to use the survey scanner once per celestial body, per game. If the NBS won't recognize that the Mun/Minmus have already been scanned, then that's a bug and if you can duplicate it in a stock install then it needs to be filed in the bugtracker.

4 hours ago, bewing said:

1. I thought I remembered seeing this issue filed as a bug report, but I can't find it. Are you using any mods?

 

Just some of the more common ones... HyperEdit, KER, Alarm Clock, Chatterer. Still at 1.0.5 here. 

 

Haven't actually tried the NBS on a separate ship yet just checking before I send a mining ship to Ike.
It's a known stock bug in 1.0.5

10 hours ago, FancyMouse said:

It's a known stock bug in 1.0.5

Figured it was something like that. Thank you for confirming!
